Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நுண்மாண் நுழைபுலம் இல்லான் எழில்நலம் மண்மாண் புனைபாவை யற்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The beauty and goodness of one who is destitute of knowledge by the study of great and exquisite works, is like (the beauty and goodness) of a painted earthen doll.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A beautifully sculpted and painted clay doll ('மண்மாண் புனைபாவை') is displayed prominently. It is outwardly very attractive ('எழில்நலம்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: However, a closer look reveals that the doll is hollow, lifeless, and has a crack running through it, showing the raw, unrefined clay inside.
Layered_Composition.Background: In contrast, in the soft-focus background, a real, living person with deep, intelligent eyes is shown, representing true, substantive beauty.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The beauty of a person who lacks subtle, profound, and penetrating intellect is compared to the superficial, fragile beauty of a painted clay doll.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The clay doll is the central metaphor. Its external beauty contrasts with its internal hollowness and fragility, symbolizing a person with good looks but no deep knowledge ('நுழைபுலம் இல்லான்').
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Studio lighting that highlights the painted surface of the doll, but also casts a shadow that reveals the crack and its empty interior.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Macro close-up shot, focusing on the beautiful yet flawed surface of the clay doll.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with extreme detail on the texture of the painted clay and the crack.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-quality studio product lighting, creating a sense of artificial perfection.

Cultural_Anchors: Comparison to a Painted Clay Doll ('மண்மாண் புனைபாவை')
